TopicTitle: Mk 1 launch pad... In science mode?

Articles.Content:
I’m preparing to launch my interplanetary expedition, and it says my rocket is too big. What?

I look at the launchpad, and it’s the level 1!

I exit and re-enter the VAB, and it fixed itself.

Edit(s): Now it’s the right pad, but it still says my rocket is too big

I went to the engineer report and it was 160/18 tonnes. It’s so overweight for the mk1 launchpad

 

It happened again.

Edited March 15, 2021 by Wizard Kerbal
